lead_paragraph: Officials say the information, seized by American-backed militias in Syria, could help fight militants on the battlefield and prevent fighters from slipping into Europe.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Secures Vast Trove of Intelligence on Islamic State
headline.main: U.S. Secures Vast New Trove of Intelligence on ISIS

snippet: Officials say the information, seized by American-backed militias in Syria, could help fight militants on the battlefield and prevent fighters from slipping into Europe....
abstract: United States officials say US-backed Syrian Kurdish and Arab militias have secured vast amount of intelligence about Islamic State while fighting in northern Syria.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
